name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Database Development

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Da: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Database Development The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Database Development is designed to offer students the opportunity of a specialized study to provide students with experience in key courses of this discipline at the undergraduate level. This CUGS prepares students to sit for the following certification exams: DP-900: Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals MySQL 8.0 Database Developer | 1Z0-909 MySQL 8.0 Database Administrator | 1Z0-908 Oracle Database Foundations | 1Z0-006

notes: Required Courses Students are required to take the following courses:
Total Required Credits for the Program: 12 s.h.
